Features

power of jekyll one

People quite often ask if static websites make sense for anything beyond a one-page website. The answer is clearly yes!

Static websites can make sense for any type of website, from a portfolio website to an e-commerce store. Static websites are becoming increasingly popular because they are faster, more secure, and easier to maintain than traditional dynamic websites. Static websites are also great for search engine optimization as they are easier for search engines to crawl and index.

Learn the top features of JekyllOne.

Design

The Web is everywhere. J1 Theme supports modern web browsers on all devices for best results on PCs, Tablets, and SmartPhones.

read · Follow Your Visitors

Tools

Current Technology and Design. Excellent performance in running a website. Use Jekyll One to present your content at its best.

read · Make your Web Site unique

Time

No programming is needed to start using J1 Theme. The theme provides a large number of building blocks to develop modern web pages in minutes.

read · Configure whats to be done

Jekyll One

featured theme for jekyll

People quite often ask if static websites make sense for anything beyond a one-page website. Some others see in static websites the stone age of the World Wide Web. What is achievable today?

This board highlights top features, which make static webs not only an option but a state-of-the-art technology to create fast, secure, and sophisticated websites for many use cases.

  • Current Technology and Design. Excellent performance on all devices.

  • Fully Responsive. Best results on PCs, Tablets, and SmartPhones.

  • Start in no time. No programming is needed using Jekyll One.

Explore what the J1 Template system can do for your next website.

  • Jekyll One

    General Features

    Excellent tools in their latest versions make the rocket engine for each and every website.

    J1 Theme is based on ready-to-use frameworks, extensions, and modules. All build-in frameworks are are open source, well known, and and free to use.

    Platforms

    The J1 Theme is based on the Ruby language of the latest versions of V3. Websites created by Jekyll One Theme are managed by NodeJS. The built-in script engine provided simplifies the management of J1 projects a lot. Well-known commands typically used to manage software projects are at your fingertips.

    Easy to learn, easy to remember. Commands support creators to concentrate on the content and not get lost in project management.

    Ruby 2.7
    Jekyll 4.3
    NodeJS 14.x

    read · Platforms

    Frameworks

    To not reinvent wheels, J1 Theme is based on ready-to-use frameworks, extensions, and modules. All build-in frameworks are industry standard, well known, and accepted worldwide.

    For current webs, a must: responsiveness and modern design. Jekyll One is based on Bootstrap, the leading platform to create today's responsive webs.

    Professional websites on the internet define standards. All current sites support dynamic, fast loading, and some more features. For fastest loading, all HTML, CSS, and Javascript have been compressed automatically for production. Going further for dynamic, AJAX loading for J1 webs is supported as well.

    No way: icons and icon fonts are required to make a site understandable. J1 supports four icon fonts to manage this. Icons are used for extensions, modules, and content.

    Software products of today are not easy to manage. To get the complexity out of your way, J1 is fully configurable. No need to dive in the deep.

    Configure what is to be done.

    Bootstrap V5
    Enhanced HTML, CSS and Javascript
    Icon Fonts
    Fully configurable components

    read · Frameworks

    Devices

    The Web is everywhere. J1 Theme supports modern web browsers on all devices for best results on PCs, Tablets, and SmartPhones.

    Mobile devices are great for apps designed for these platforms. Using a web browser to surf websites is often frustrating on mobiles. Jekyll One provides navigation systems that cover both worlds: desktops and mobiles.

    Performance is a key factor for all users. To not get visitors lost, J1 webs are highly optimized. All Websites will achieve best Google Lighthouse scores for performance, accessibility, best practices, and search engine optimization at a green level.

    Support your visitors.

    Desktop and Mobile support
    Mobile Web Navigation
    Highest Google Lighthouse Scores

    read · Devices
  • Jekyll One

    Theme Features

    For Jekyll, many modules like sliders and galleries are available to cover typical use cases for websites.

    All modules are fully integrated and easily used by simple configuration, which makes programming not needed. The theme provides many building blocks to create modern web pages in minutes.

    Modules

    The J1 theme provides a large number of building blocks to create modern web pages in minutes. The base idea of the J1 Theme is to give all people a toolset at their hands to create a website with no need to start web development or web design from the beginning.

    Use whats's prepared already.

    Infinite srcoll
    Animate on srcoll
    Floating Action Buttons
    Full-text search engine (Lunr)
    Cookie consent (GDPR compatible)
    Translator (Google, Deepl)
    Clipboard
    Smooth-srcoll
    Enhanced Navigation
    Lightboxes
    Image and Video Galleries
    Text and Image Carousels

    read · Modules

    Extensions

    Frameworks like Bootstrap and Asciidoc are enormously flexible and customizable. Changing or adding components to frameworks requires a lot of experience. That is not the idea of J1. Customizations for the base frameworks are prepared, simple to use, and usable out-of-the-box.

    Make your site unique.

    Bootstrap extensions
    Asciidoctor extensions
    Advanced banners and panels
    Blog Post navigation
    Featured example content
    Royalty free images

    read · Extensions

    Integrations

    The Internet of today has changed a lot. The new digital world is called the cloud. Services out of the cloud is a fast-growing business. J1 Theme integrates cloud services to extend the functionality of a web for commenting features or Bootstrap themes, for example.

    Check what services powers your site.

    Bootstrap Themes
    Comment providers
    Google Analytics
    Google Ads
    YouTube Video
    Vimeo Video

    read · Integrations

Blog

latest news

Explore the blog and find interesting articles about Jekyll and general website creation processes. And this blog is an excellent example of how J1 and Jekyll can be used for blogging.

Read more on how Jekyll can be used for the powerful websites of today.

Preview

  • Welcome to Jekyll

    Jekyll is a static site generator that allows you to build websites using HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Markdown or Asciidoc for writing the content.

    It uses templates and layouts to generate the static files that make up your website, which can be hosted on any web server.

    2024 April, 25

    Jekyll
    Template · Theme

    read · Websites for Everyone

  • URLs

    What is the difference between the URLs https://domain and //domain?

    2023 October, 18
